description: NativeScript Facebook Sample Application With Angular

scripts.ci.android.build: npm run build.plugin && tns build android
scripts.ci.ios.build: npm run build.plugin && tns build ios
scripts.gen:keystore: keytool -genkey -v -keystore neo.keystore -alias alias_name -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -storepass changeit -keypass changeit -dname "CN=NeoApp, OU=Neo, O=Emirates, L=Dubai, S=Dubai, C=UAE"
scripts.gen:apk: tns build android --release --key-store-path neo.keystore --key-store-password changeit --key-store-alias neo --key-store-alias-password changeit
scripts.gen:hash: keytool -exportcert -alias neo -keystore neo.keystore -storepass changeit | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
scripts.gen:hash:debug: keytool -exportcert -alias androiddebugkey -keystore %HOMEPATH%/.android/debug.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
